messages.message:
From the AI Hub advancements call, noting here an example of where "json" seems now to be returned along with a JSON schema in the following cleaning prompt: "Return the information in a JSON schema in the following format: {'street_number': number, 'street_address': string, 'city': string, 'state': 2 letter US state code, 'zip': US zip code}"
> I often use this cleaning prompt in demos for address parsing and feel this has changed (the word json now appearing) in the last few days.
I don't know how cleaning prompts work (I don't know if the check for parable json in the output) but the prompt seems problematic
it should state "return the output in the following json schema" not "return a json schema "
My guess is that these `type labels` are being prepended when single object types are returned (as opposed to composite responses made up of multiple types of objects)?
the cleaning prompts I don't think are using types
